Electrobatons.abilityText: Ability (Flurry of Blows): After you resolve an attack during your activation, you may perform a Melee attack using 1 green die. Apply +1 Hit to the attack results. Limit once per activation.

surges.label: Apply -1 Dodge to the defense results

Electrohammer.abilityText: Ability (Electro-pulse): After you resolve an attack, each other figure adjacent to the target suffers 1 Damage.

Electrostaff.abilityText: Ability (Quick Strike): After you resolve an attack, if the defending player rerolled a defense die or modified the dice pool or defense results, the defender suffers 1 Damage.
